text: void delete ( long int a [ ] , long int i , long int * n ) { long int c ; for ( c = i ; c < * n - 1 ; c ++ ) a [ c ] = a [ c + 1 ] ; ( * n ) -- ; } int main ( ) { int t ; long int i , n , a [ 100000 ] , cost ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; int i = 0 ; while ( i < n ) scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ++ ] ) ; i = 1 ; cost = 0 ; while ( i < n ) { if ( a [ i ] > a [ i - 1 ] ) { cost += a [ i - 1 ] ; delete ( a , i , & n ) ; } else { cost += a [ i ] ; delete ( a , i - 1 , & n ) ; } } printf ( "%ld\n" , cost ) ; } return 0 ; }
